channel.title: [Added] Add CIPA (Botswana) to the Organisation Registration Agency Codelist
channel.description:
The following addition to the Organisation Registration Agency codelist has been proposed. Following successful approval from the IATI technical team the code will be added to the codelist within a week.
Code: BW-CIPA Name: The Companies and Intellectual Property Authority (CIPA) Description: The Companies and Intellectual Property Authority (CIPA) of the Ministry of Trade and Industry in Botswana is mandated to register businesses and protect intellectual property rights through the administration of four pieces of legislation. URL: www.cipa.co.bw Public database: http://www.mtinamesearch.gov.bw/search/
